quiz.text: Health Management Information System (HMIS) Version 2.0 has been developed in collaboration with which of the following entities?
options: National Informatics Centre
WHO
Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation
1 and 2
1 and 3

quiz.text: Kilkari Mobile Application delivers weekly, time-sensitive audio information about reproductive, maternal, neonatal and child health (RMNCH) directly to families’ mobile phones from the __________ of pregnancy.
options: 3rd month
4th month
8th month
6th month
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the first Indian Architectural Heritage Sub-Committee Meeting for “Communicating India’s Scientifically Validated Traditional Knowledge to the Society (SVASTIK)” has been organized. Which of the following is the Nodal organization for SVASTIK initiative?
options: National Commission for Indian System of Medicine
Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences
WHO
CSIR - National Institute of Science Communication and Policy Research
1 and 2

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the 11th edition of Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) Bio-Energy Summit has been organized in New Delhi. With regards to the details shared at the summit, India has a production target of _______ green hydrogen by 2030.
options: 50 million tonnes
25 million tonnes
10 million tonnes
15 million tonnes
5 million tonnes

quiz.text: India is committed to eliminating Lymphatic Filariasis by _______, three years ahead of the global target.
options: 2029
2027
2030
2032
2024

quiz.text: 4 States account for around 60% Lymphedema cases in India. Which of the following is not one of the 4 states which collectively accounts for 60% Lymphedema cases?
options: Uttar Pradesh
Odisha
Madhya Pradesh
Telangana
Bihar

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Ministry of Coal has informed that Mine water discharged from the operational/ abandoned mines are benefitting approximately 18 lakh people living in about 900 villages in the proximity of coal mining areas. Coal/Lignite PSUs have covered around _______ land under plantation in the current fiscal till December 2022 and around 360 Ha under grassing.
options: 630 Ha
2230 Ha
360 Ha
1480 Ha
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), Startup India Innovation Week (SIIW) 2023 has been organized by which of the following entities?
options: NITI Aayog
Ministry of Commerce & Industry
Ministry of Finance
CII
1 and 4

quiz.text: Which of the following ministries had launched the ‘Womaniya’ initiative?
options: Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare
Ministry of Finance
Ministry of Women & Child Development
Ministry of Commerce & Industry
Ministry of Rural Development

quiz.text:
Recently (Jan 2023), the 13th Ministerial-level meeting of India – United States Trade Policy Forum (TPF) has been organized in Washington, DC, USA. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to India-US TPF?

A.     It was established in 2021.

B.      It works on 5 focus areas.

C.      Agriculture is one of the focus areas of India-US TPF.
options: A and B
B and C
C only
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: According to India Australia Economic Cooperation and Trade Agreement, Australia will grant Most Favored Nation (MFN) status to India in about how many sub-sectors?
options: 31
135
120
103
21

quiz.text: As per the India-Australia ECTA, India is offering zero duty access to _____ value of products from Australia.
options: 75%
100%
95%
90%
80%

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), Union Cabinet has approved setting up of three national-level multi-state cooperative societies to promote exports and organic products. The three national cooperative bodies will be set up under the Multi-State Cooperative Societies Act, __________.
options: 1999
1994
2004
2002
2009

quiz.text:
Recently (Jan 2023), the Rajya Sabha committee has approved the request of Ministry of Home Affairs to grant six more months to frame rules under the Citizenship Amendment Act (CAA) for the seventh time in a row. CAA is not applicable to the tribal areas of which of the following states?

A.     Assam

B.      Meghalaya

C.      Manipur

D.     Arunachal Pradesh
options: A and B
A, C and D
C and D
D only
A, B, C and D

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the ___________ Tourism Board has signed Memorandum of Understandings (MoUs) with chapters of eight countries of the Global Organisation of People of Indian Origin (GOPIO) in Indore, MP at the 17th Pravasi Bhartiya Divas Convention.
options: Kerala
Maharashtra
Telangana
Uttar Pradesh
Madhya Pradesh

quiz.text: Special Allowance of ___________ per month to Women employees with Disability has been granted for child care with effect from 01st July, 2022, which will increase by 25% on increase of DA by 50%.
options: Rs. 1000
Rs. 5000
Rs. 3000
Rs. 2000
Rs. 1500

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), Union Minister for Commerce and Industry addressed the felicitation ceremony of National Startup Awards 2022 in New Delhi and has also launched the MAARG Portal. What does ‘M’ in MAARG stands for?
options: Mentorship
Multi
Market
Money
Mobility

quiz.text:
Recently (Jan 2023), the 1st Health Working Group (HWG) Meeting under G20 Health track has been organized. The Health Track of the G20 India Presidency will comprise 4 Health Working Group (HWG) Meetings and 1 Health Ministerial Meeting (HMM). The meetings will be held in which of the following places?

A.     Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala

B.      Hyderabad, Telangana

C.      Gandhinagar, Gujarat
options: A and B
B only
A only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: India is currently part of the G20 Troika comprising which of the following nations?
options: Indonesia, India and Australia
Indonesia, India and Japan
Indonesia, India and Argentina
Indonesia, India and Turkey
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the Ministry of Tourism has informed that 1st Global Tourism Summit will be organized under the aegis of India’s G20 Presidency in April 2023. Who among the following is going to be the industry partner for the summit?
options: EaseMyTrip
Indian Hotels Company Limited
CII
IRCTC
FICCI

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), India has participated in the First Movers Coalition (FMC) Leadership Meeting of the World Economic Forum. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to FMC?
options: It was launched by United states in partnership of WEF in 2021.
It aims to decarbonize five “hard to abate” industrial sectors.
It wants to reduce emissions to net-zero by 2050.
1 and 2
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the UIDAI has decided to work on five core areas to provide continued support to residents in their daily lives, enhance data security, and encourage good governance. One of the core areas is to Collaborate with global economies and support them in their aspiration to achieve SDG _______, which advocates for legal identity for all.
options: 17.9
14.9
16.9
7.9
5.9

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), ________ has become India's fourth-largest trading partner with imports from the country spiking five-fold to USD 32.9 billion during the April-December FY 23 period.
options: UAE
Australia
France
Russia
Japan

quiz.text: Recently (Jan 2023), the 13th session of the IRENA assembly has been organized in Abu Dhabi, UAE. Which of the following countries has assumed the Presidency of the 13th session?
options: India
Saudi Arabia
Brazil
China
Germany
